values.name: grid-lanes
values.prose: This value causes an element to generate a block-level grid lanes container box.

values.name: inline-grid-lanes
values.prose: This value causes an element to generate an inline-level grid lanes container box.

properties.name: flow-tolerance
properties.percentages: relative to the grid-axis content box size of the grid lanes container

values.name: <length-percentage>
values.prose: Specifies the tie threshold for the grid lanes container. Placement positions are considered to be equally good (“tied”) if they are within the specified distance from the shortest position.

values.name: normal
values.prose: Resolves to a used value of 1em in grid lanes layout and a used value of 0 in all other layout modes.

values.name: infinite
values.prose: Specifies an infinite tie threshold. This makes items distribute themselves strictly in order, without considering the length of the tracks at all.

warnings.name: normal
warnings.prose: The initial value of this property is normal, which determines the orientation from the grid-template-* properties:
